cc.mallet.topics

Class PAM4L

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.mallet.topics.PAM4L

  • public class PAM4L
extends java.lang.Object
    Four Level Pachinko Allocation with MLE learning, based on Andrew's Latent Dirichlet Allocation.
    Author:
    David Mimno
